implementation.name: Addition block in main loop
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Handles the addition operation when the user selects 'Addition'. It reads two inputs, converts them to integers, and prints the sum.
implementation.pseudo_code:
LOOP forever:
    Show menu
    Get user choice
    Get num1 from input
    Get num2 from input
    IF choice == 1 (Addition):
        Print num1 + num2

missing_implementations: All error messages should be generic and user-friendly.
Show the error if any of the input is having the error during addition.
Internal error details must not be exposed to users.
Detailed errors should be logged securely for debugging.

implementation.name: main calculator loop (subtraction branch)
implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Implements the subtraction operation as part of the main calculator loop. When the user selects option 2, it performs subtraction and prints the result.
implementation.pseudo_code:
LOOP forever:
    Display menu options
    Get user choice
    Get first number
    Get second number
    IF choice is 2 (Subtraction):
        Print the result of num1 - num2

missing_implementations: All error messages should be generic and user-friendly.
Internal error details must not be exposed to users.
Detailed errors should be logged securely for debugging.
